item.title: Using Traefik 2 and Docker for local development with multiple projects
item.description: TL;DR Fine, just skip directly to the Github repo that has a complete example of how to do this: https://github.com/jimbojsb/docker-traefik-local-dev Background What is Traefik Traefik is a reverse proxy. This seems more complicated than doing nothing… Step 1: Get a real domain name, and host it in public DNS In order to get “real” SSL/TLS working, you need a real, publicly-registered-on-the-internet domain name.
